#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

mr-common is a common Java SE/EE framework. Was develop with Apache common's, Spring (Core, DAO, Webflow, MVC), Hibernate, and Birt Report.


= Details =

The framework is divided into modules (jars):
  * mr-common-core
  * mr-common-dao
  * mr-common-security
  * mr-common-security-userentity
  * mr-common-web
  * mr-common-birt

Each module is compiled with [http://maven.apache.org/ Apache Maven 2].
